snippet.title: Bejeweled 2 onboard Emirates Airlines [Shaky Camera][1080p]
snippet.description:
Bejewelling at 36,000 Feet (~11,000 Metres) in the air!

Also it's hard to control the board with one hand and hold the camera in the other to record it.

BTW, it's not just Emirates that has Bejeweled 2. Although I have had variants of it where intersections didN'T count as a power gem - which ironically made Puzzle Mode impossible to clear.
————————————————————————————
— Bejeweled 2 (Airline Version) —
You are here

— Bejeweled 2 (PC) —
Classic (2017) — https://youtu.be/75ElCdhE2xI
Bejeweled 1 Classic (2017) — https://youtu.be/u4JSHZFGIOw
Action (2017) — https://youtu.be/06dU2PKXQWw
Twilight — https://youtu.be/AWIaiM2v3wQ
Hyper — https://youtu.be/941fyNjAmCc
Hyper (SLOMO) — https://youtu.be/9ltnqxbfTBw
Finity — https://youtu.be/nPC5a6yvfRI
Puzzle — https://youtu.be/AdzjTTxnomM
Cognito — https://youtu.be/_RTWl9aTaZ4
Ultimate Score — https://youtu.be/CqAL53rSHQY

— Bejeweled 2 (Android) —
Classic — https://youtu.be/qFLiGkKbI1Q
Action — https://youtu.be/eFI1A5vP2Hk

— Bejeweled 2 (PlayStation Portable) —
( Not yet recorded )
